snippet: Brig. Gen. Jeffrey A. Sinclair is expected to plead guilty to sharply reduced charges in the military’s most closely watched sexual assault case.
abstract: Brig Gen Jeffrey A Sinclair, senior officer prosecuted in the military’s most closely watched sexual assault case, agrees to guilty plea on sharply reduced charges; prosecutors dismiss charges related to forcing a captain into sex and threatening to kill her and her family; Sinclair will be required to leave military, though sentencing will likely be far lighter now that sexual assault charge has been dropped.
lead_paragraph: Brig. Gen. Jeffrey A. Sinclair is expected to plead guilty to sharply reduced charges in the military’s most closely watched sexual assault case.

headline.main: Army General Reaches Deal on Sex Counts
headline.print_headline: Army General Reaches Deal on Sex Counts

keywords.value: United States Defense and Military Forces
keywords.name: subject
